body.p:
To his Excellency B Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

Your petitioner Thomas J Smith states that at the Novr ^1860^ Term of the Washington Circuit Court a fine of $6500 was assessed against him for carrying a pistol -- He states that at the time he carried said pistol he was Just getting out of a hard spell of sickness and was very feeble -- and petitioner had been informed that his life had been threatened by two or three persons in the neighborhood, with whom he had had some difficulties ^and he was advised by his freinds to go armed^ and the time he was seen with a pistol was afterwards while in a difficulty with one of these persons and petitioner did not use said pistol then
We state that he is a poor man and has a -
Wherefore he prays your Excellency to remit said fine &c
Sworn to before me by T J Smith Decr 27th 1860 --

R S Peters C. W. C
